title: Comfort from Friends to Counter Worry about Exam

content.question: Jasmine is worried about an upcoming exam. Which scenario best illustrates emotion-focused coping?

choices.label: Jasmine decides it is pointless studying, because she thinks her teacher is unfair.
Jasmine decides to put off going to a party until she studies for two hours.
Jasmine reaches out to her friends for comfort to reduce her stress.
Jasmine sets aside an hour each night to study for her exam and goes to the instructorâ€™s extra study session.

content.answer: Jasmine reaches out to her friends for comfort to reduce her stress.
